title: Little Complicated
body:
It goes like this. I'm a player from Garena's PH LoL server but currently I'm in Japan for work. Thing is, I can't play my old account because of fking region block so I opted to play in the NA server because I still can't read full Kanji.

Problem is, I don't have any means to purchase RPs. Our supervisors are overly strict about making credit cards, soooo, shit. So I tried every convenience stores, malls near in my location and not a single on of them are selling. So I'm out of options.

Really hoping you guys (RIOT) would provide one. I have a fuck ton of money here ready to throw at you.

replies.body: Sorry it's been such a hassle to get RP.  :(  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case.  I can't make any guarantees, but our billing team might be able to find some options  best fit for your specific issue.  We'll see ya there!
thanks for the reply! :D Will do
